Act & Acre Cold Processed Hair Oil

Brand: Act + Acre

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil, Squalane, Argania spinosa kernel (argan) oil, Crambe abyssinica seed oil phytosterol esters, Fragrance

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive
al and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
